body:
Comment 2: 
Your code sample does this

x, err := something()
if err != nil {
    // print error
    // and continue
}
// use x

If there is an error, you cannot continue to assume anything about the state of the
values returned.

I am sorry if I have misidentified your error. If you believe there is still a problem
please correct your code and reopen the issue by adding an additional comment.
_Status changed to **Invalid**._
